title: After H&M, more foreign retail brands under fire in China in Xinjiang fallout
content:
1. After H&M, more foreign retail brands under fire in China in Xinjiang fallout  Reuters
  2. Global brands face backlash in China for rejecting Xinjiang cotton  South China Morning Post
  3. Nike faces social media storm in China over Xinjiang statement  Fox Business
  4. Xinjiang cotton signals long, hard China-US ideological fight: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. Chinese public voices support for Xinjiang cotton, turns to domestic brands over H&M, Nike- Global Times  The Edge Markets MY
